page.title: 15West Hove Middle School
page.content: The school was built in 1905,so the roof is slated and it has a bell tower.When the First World War broke out the school was used as a hospital which explains the open fires which have been boarded off.Our school has very high ceilings with the compass points still painted on.We did have wooden floorboards,but they were so creaky that the school put carpet down.We have 11 classrooms with 289 children & 14 teachers.We have sash windows with the original wooden frames which are high up. Our practical lessons are Cookery, Science,Woodwork & Craft.With the school fund we have bought two BBC computers .Our playgrounds have been tarmacked & game markings (football, netball,basketball & hopscotch)have been painted on it.We have grassbanks where we used to grow vegetables.
